MS MCQs

    Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. When the Marketing team at Microsoft began planning to implement AI into their operations, what was their primary goal?

      Improve the conversion-to-sales rates.

      Increase the profitability of marketing expenditures.

      Reduce the marketing workforce by one-third.

      Improve the marketing skills of sales personnel.


    2. When the Marketing team at Microsoft implemented AI technology in their operations, they discovered that it required three important players to work together.

    Who were those players?

      Marketing Leadership, AI Integrators, Data Scientists.

      IT System Administrators, Marketers, Sales Engineers.

      Marketers, Data Scientists, Engineers.

      Learning Specialists, Marketers, Data Scientists.


    3. According to Chris Capossela, Microsoft CMO, which approach is recommended when planning an AI implementation for any organization?

      Assemble a project team to find areas where AI fits within the organization.

      Consult with Microsoft AI Engineers for integration recommendations.

      Train organization staff on the AI tools, and they will find a way to use them.

      List the organization’s most important business processes, and find AI tools that apply to them.


    4. When the Marketing team at Microsoft implemented AI technology into their processes, which AI tool did they use to enhance lead-scoring?

      Machine Learning

      Language Learning

      Vision Capabilities

      Knowledge Understanding
